textBox.richText: Starbucks may be ruling the USA but it hasn’t stopped us from finding good coffee. Disclaimer: we did succumb to the Starbucks vortex at a weak moment (6am LAX airport before our flight to NYC). We’ve found a distinct ‘3’ and ‘2’ and we’re currently on the look out for a third good coffee joint. Abraco apparently has a good chance of this - the place receives good reviews and a mountain of Foursquare checkins! Scoreboard so far: 3 votes - 9th Street Espresso - Chelsea Markets 2 votes - Blue Bottle Cafe - Williamsburg 1 vote - TBC
In pursuit of the perfect pour...
